Guard duty
Main Skill: Agility
Max Efficiency: 210%

As a guard in the Wallisian Empire, you've got bills to pay, and this is how you do it. You watch over the kingdom, ensuring you get paid for your watchful eyes.

The Guard duty activity is a Agility activity.

Locations

This activity can be done at the following locations:

  • Bilgemont Port in Grand Duchy of Trellin-Erdwise
  • Blackspell Port in Grand Duchy of Trellin-Erdwise
  • Everhaven in Grand Duchy of Trellin-Erdwise
  • Warrenfield in Grand Duchy of Trellin-Erdwise

Requirements

Skill Level Requirements:

  • At least Agility lvl. 55.

Keyword Requirements:

  • Have Light source equipped.
  • Have Shield equipped.
  • Have Weapon equipped.

Other Requirements:

  • Have [40] Erdwise faction reputation.

Visibility

This activity is always visible.
